FuncDef: The display bgp mdt all update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups in the BGP-MDT address family.
CLIs: display bgp mdt all update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp mdt all update-peer-group index 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about update peer-groups in the BGP-MDT address family in the current system, run display bgp mdt all update-peer-group command. Details about update peer-groups can be displayed based on the update peer-group index.
